address_to_code.name: Address Geocode Input
address_to_code.comment: Add an input field to automatically get the geocodes from an address. Uses Nominatim. Please check their usage policy.

height.name: Height
height.comment: The height of the map in pixels or add the unit to the height

display.name: Display Value
display.comment: The property of the map object to save
display.placeholder: house_number, address, neighbourhood, suburb, city, state, postcode, country, country_code, lat, lng

mapLat.name: Default Latitude
mapLat.comment: This is the latitude to use when displaying the map

mapLng.name: Default Longitude
mapLng.comment: This is the longitude to use when displaying the map

defaultZoom.name: Default Zoom
defaultZoom.comment: This is the initial zoom level to use when displaying the map

maxZoom.name: Max Zoom
maxZoom.comment: This is the maximum zoom level to allow when displaying the map

inputs.name: Address Input
inputs.comment: Input configuration - attach the name of the applicable fields to the data properties

theme.name: Interface Theme
theme.comment: Depending on additional themes available, you may be able to choose the style theme of the map
